workflows.name: Initialize Campaign Builder
workflows.description: Initialize the campaign builder page by fetching templates and any saved drafts from the API. Set up the campaign data structure and handle any errors.

text.en: Create and manage marketing campaigns with AI assistance

_ww-text_text.en: Create and manage marketing campaigns with AI assistance

text.en: Create your first marketing campaign with AI assistance. Choose from templates, customize content, and schedule for optimal engagement.

_ww-text_text.en: Create your first marketing campaign with AI assistance. Choose from templates, customize content, and schedule for optimal engagement.

interactions.name: Open Campaign Editor
interactions.description: Opens the campaign editor popup for creating a new campaign

interactions.name: Edit Campaign
interactions.description: Opens the campaign editor popup with the selected campaign data

interactions.name: Schedule Campaign
interactions.description: Opens the schedule popup for the selected campaign

interactions.name: Create First Campaign
interactions.description: Opens the campaign editor popup for creating a new campaign

interactions.name: Delete Campaign
interactions.description: Opens the delete confirmation popup for the selected campaign

interactions.name: Update Editor Content
interactions.description: Updates the editor content variable

default.placeholder: Start typing your campaign content or use AI to generate content...

interactions.name: Close Campaign Editor
interactions.description: Closes the campaign editor popup

interactions.name: Save Campaign Draft
interactions.description: Saves the current campaign as a draft

interactions.name: Update Campaign Name
interactions.description: Updates the campaign name variable

interactions.name: Update Selected Template
interactions.description: Updates the selected template variable

interactions.name: Update Selected Audience
interactions.description: Updates the selected audience variable

choices.label: New Customers
choices.description: Target customers who recently signed up

choices.label: Active Users
choices.description: Target customers who are actively using the platform

choices.label: Inactive Users
choices.description: Target customers who haven't used the platform recently

interactions.name: Update AI Prompt
interactions.description: Updates the AI prompt variable

placeholder.en: Enter specific instructions for AI content generation

interactions.name: Generate AI Content
interactions.description: Generates content using AI based on the selected template and parameters

interactions.name: Send Campaign Now
interactions.description: Sends the campaign immediately after confirmation

interactions.name: Close Delete Confirmation
interactions.description: Closes the delete confirmation popup

interactions.name: Update Recurring End Date
interactions.description: Updates the recurring end date variable

text.en: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign? This action cannot be undone and all campaign data will be permanently lost.

_ww-text_text.en: Are you sure you want to delete this campaign? This action cannot be undone and all campaign data will be permanently lost.

interactions.name: Cancel Delete
interactions.description: Cancels the delete operation and closes the popup

interactions.name: Confirm Delete
interactions.description: Confirms the delete operation and removes the campaign

interactions.name: Close Schedule Campaign
interactions.description: Closes the schedule campaign popup

interactions.name: Update Schedule Date
interactions.description: Updates the schedule date variable

interactions.name: Toggle Recurring
interactions.description: Toggles the recurring campaign option

interactions.name: Update Recurring Frequency
interactions.description: Updates the recurring frequency variable

interactions.name: Cancel Schedule
interactions.description: Cancels the schedule operation and closes the popup

interactions.name: Confirm Schedule
interactions.description: Confirms the schedule and updates the campaign

interactions.name: Open Schedule Popup
interactions.description: Opens the schedule popup for the current campaign

interactions.name: Set Week Period
interactions.description: Sets the selected period to week

interactions.name: Toggle AI Assistant
interactions.description: Toggles the AI assistant on/off

interactions.name: Set Day Period
interactions.description: Sets the selected period to day

interactions.name: Set Month Period
interactions.description: Sets the selected period to month

interactions.name: Set Chat Day Period
interactions.description: Sets the chat period to day

interactions.name: Set Chat Week Period
interactions.description: Sets the chat period to week

interactions.name: Set Chat Month Period
interactions.description: Sets the chat period to month

f5cf4925-d093-47b3-93ec-464daac2b564.name: isValid
f5cf4925-d093-47b3-93ec-464daac2b564.description: Check if the campaign form is valid by verifying all required fields are filled

28965f37-6f4b-4e95-838c-ab785c4cd9c5.description: Handle AI content generation by calling the global generate function and updating editor content
